sentence.Network_en: It is a harmonious community where pupils are happy and industrious.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个和睦的集体，学生们开心玩耍，用功读书。

sentence.Network_en: The architecture is harmonious and no building is over five or six floors high.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里的建筑风格和谐统一，没有哪座楼房高于五六层。

职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... harm 伤害，危害，损害 harmonious 协调的，悦耳的，和睦 harness 治理，利用.

元旦大合唱曲目_张老师_新浪博客 ... forever friends( 永远的朋友) in harmony( 和谐无间).

entry.tran: （关系、协定、讨论）融洽的，和睦的，友好的
entry.def: A harmonious relationship, agreement, or discussion is friendly and peaceful.

example.ex: Their harmonious relationship resulted in part from their similar goals...
example.tran: 他们关系融洽的部分原因是他们有着相似的目标。

example.ex: It is a harmonious community where pupils are happy and industrious.
example.tran: 这是一个和睦的集体，学生们开心玩耍，用功读书。

entry.def: Something that is harmonious has parts which go well together and which are in proportion to each other.

example.ex: The architecture is harmonious and no building is over five or six floors high.
example.tran: 这里的建筑风格和谐统一，没有哪座楼房高于五六层。

example.ex: ...a harmonious balance of mind, body, and spirit.
example.tran: 头脑、身体和心灵的协调

entry.def: Musical notes that are harmonious produce a pleasant sound when played together.

example.ex: ...the mysterious skill involved in producing harmonious sounds.
example.tran: 发出悦耳声音的神秘技巧

means.word_mean: 2. exhibiting equivalence or correspondence among constituents of an entity or between different entities

sentences.sentence: "the tailored clothes were harmonious with her military bearing"

auth_sentence.content: It was a harmonious marriage of East and West.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a harmonious marriage of East and West.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a harmonious marriage of East and West.

auth_sentence.content: They want some associate sounds to make them harmonious.
auth_sentence.res_content: They want some associate sounds to make them harmonious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They want some associate sounds to make them harmonious.

auth_sentence.content: Harmonious groups are flourishing better then groups with permanent mutual trouble.
auth_sentence.res_content: Harmonious groups are flourishing better then groups with permanent mutual trouble.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Harmonious groups are flourishing better then groups with permanent mutual trouble.

means.word_mean: 和谐的,和睦的;协调的,调和的

sentences.en: If they would simply go home,all under the Heavens would be harmonious once more.
sentences.cn: 只要他们撤回本国去,大家又会相安无事了。

sentences.en: They can build a more harmonious society once inequality and exploitation are removed.
sentences.cn: 消除了不均与剥削，他们就能建立一个更为和谐的社会。
